definitions: not having a sharpened or tapered tip

examples.text: the second person hands the stakes to the third, unpointed ends first

shortDefinitions: not having sharpened or tapered tip

definitions: (of a Semitic alphabet) written without dots or small strokes to indicate vowels or distinguish consonants

examples.text: the source is unpointed Hebrew or Arabic

shortDefinitions: (of Semitic language) written without dots or small strokes to indicate vowels or distinguish consonants

definitions: (of brickwork, a brick structure, or tiling) having joints that are not filled in or repaired

examples.text: lumps of exposed brick with unpointed mortar

shortDefinitions: (of brickwork, brick structure, or tiling) having joints that are not filled in or repaired
